entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the evening. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets in the evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
